CustomField.formula: OR( IF( ISBLANK(Federated_Fullname__c), $User.Username = Owner.Username, $User.FederationIdentifier = Federated_Owner__r.FederationIdentifier ), $User.Is_Debug_User__c = TRUE, AND( $User.FederationIdentifier = "BRO999", NOT(ISBLANK(Federated_Owner__c)) ) )
CustomField.label: Is Current User Same As Creator
